item.title: Down the Rabbit Hole: The MPI and Chroot Nightmare
item.description: Sometimes the hardest part of debugging isn't finding the bug - it's just getting to a clean test environment. Here's how we spent hours fighting MPI libraries and chroot configurations before we could even start benchmarking.
